inputs.name: aiprovider
inputs.label: AI Provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AI provider to use for generating commit messages

inputs.name: aiproviderkey
inputs.label: AI Provider API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key for the selected AI provider

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Model to use. Defaults to 'claude-3-sonnet-20240229' for Anthropic & 'gpt-4' for OpenAI. Required for Azure - should match your deployment name

inputs.name: azendpoint
inputs.label: Azure OpenAI Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The endpoint URL for Azure OpenAI (only required when using Azure OpenAI)

inputs.name: systempromptoverride
inputs.label: System Prompt Override
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the default system prompt for the AI model

inputs.name: projectspecificcontext
inputs.label: Project Specific Context
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional context about the project to help the AI generate better commit messages

inputs.name: maxtokens
inputs.label: Max Tokens
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of tokens to use in the API request

inputs.name: recurse
inputs.label: Recurse
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to recursively process commit messages. Will stop at the first instance of [commitscribe_signoff]
